sentences.english: I should like to express my heartfelt gratitude for your gracious receptionhospitality.
sentences.chinese: 我願向你們盛情的接待與款待表示衷心的感謝。

sentences.english: I thank countries who are making the results of their investigations publicly available.
sentences.chinese: 我衷心感謝將調查結果公之於衆的國家。

sentences.english: Heartiest congratulations on your splendid victory.
sentences.chinese: 衷心祝賀您取得輝煌勝利。

sentences.english: We sincerely hope that Thailand enjoys social harmony, economic development as well as prosperity and peace.
sentences.chinese: 衷心祝願泰國社會和諧，經濟發展，國泰民安。

sentences.english: I wish you all the best pictures you can get and a ton of happy customers.
sentences.chinese: 我衷心祝願你們都有好前景，收穫一大堆的快樂顧客。

sentences.english: On behalf of the staff at Canada Weifang Secondary School (CWSS), we would like to welcome you.
sentences.chinese: 代表中加班的教職員工，我們對您表示衷心地歡迎。

sentences.english: She is really a very sweet girl, and I wish with all my heart she were well settled.
sentences.chinese: 她的確是位可愛的姑娘，我衷心希望她談門好親事。

sentences.english: eg: I sincerely wish this Business Summit a complete success.
sentences.chinese: 我衷心祝願本屆峯會取得圓滿成功。

sentences.english: Your experience and guidance have always been appreciated.
sentences.chinese: 您的經歷和引導，一直讓我衷心感激。

sentences.english: A special wish for my friend . May the beauty of the season bring joy to your heart.
sentences.chinese: 衷心祝願我的朋友，願這良辰美景帶給你內心的歡樂。

sentences.english: At last Class 6 won the first prize and Class 3 congratulated them warmly.
sentences.chinese: 最後，6班贏了，3班衷心地向他們表示祝賀。

sentences.english: We avail ourselves of this opportunity to express our heartful gratitude to you.
sentences.chinese: 我們藉此機會向你們表示衷心的感謝。

sentences.english: I'd love to congratulate you as you graduate.
sentences.chinese: 在你畢業之際，我向你表明衷心祝福。

sentences.english: I sincerely hope that my website with free resources has been helpful to you.
sentences.chinese: 我衷心希望我的網站所提供的免費資源對你是有用的。

sentences.english: He also expressed his heartfelt gratitude for China's unselfish assistance to Cambodia in the past years.
sentences.chinese: 他對中國多年來給予柬無私的援助表示衷心的感謝。

sentences.english: We couldn’t have agreed more when he said that the elements of a peace formula are known.
sentences.chinese: 當他說到和平方案的要素無人不知時，我們衷心贊同。

definition: to express/to present/to extend/to tender (greetings, thanks etc)
to wish/to express good wishes/to pray/(old) wizard
earnestly and sincerely (idiom); with all sincerity
